results.content:
content is great. they've done a good job putting all that into a 1 hour class.
one thing that gets me was the video quality. even though i was watching it in 720p the font size was small and quality wasnt that good. had to force my eyesight when following her coding along.
overall it's good

overall it's good

results.content: Really nice course. It's quick and goes straight to the point. Pascal's explanation are great and Maaike's demos are top notch (she has a nice voice too).
results.content_html: Really nice course. It's quick and goes straight to the point. Pascal's explanation are great and Maaike's demos are top notch (she has a nice voice too).

results.content: A very beginner friendly and complete introduction to Quarkus!
results.content_html: A very beginner friendly and complete introduction to Quarkus!

results.content: The first chapters except the last one can be done through the official guide on the Quarkus site, the last one is useful, but there is no tutorial on using it combined with Docker
results.content_html: The first chapters except the last one can be done through the official guide on the Quarkus site, the last one is useful, but there is no tutorial on using it combined with Docker

response.content:
Hey Sylvain! Too bad the course did not live up to your expectations. Would you be able to help us be better in the future by pointing out what you would have liked to see differently? What would have given you a satisfactory feeling about the getting started in 1 hour course?

thank you so much!

Pascal

results.content:
The course is given in a light-hearted way and the content is explained clearly and to the core. 
I am very pleased with how these two trainers have designed and given shape to this course.

results.content: Clean simple straight forward introduction on how development should be, must watch!
results.content_html: Clean simple straight forward introduction on how development should be, must watch!

results.content: Expected to get information about starting my first hello world application with Quarkus, even got more insight into the entire EE landscape!
results.content_html: Expected to get information about starting my first hello world application with Quarkus, even got more insight into the entire EE landscape!

results.content: Very nice course that touches the different facets of working with Quarkus.

results.content: Interesting framework, good to get the hello world up and running.
